O

odo - Variable in class soccerbot.LightLocalizer
 
odo - Variable in class soccerbot.USLocalizer
 
odometer - Variable in class soccerbot.Navigation
 
Odometer - Class in soccerbot
Class which controls the odometer for the robot Odometer defines coordinate system as such:
Odometer(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor) - Constructor for class soccerbot.Odometer
Constructor requires the motors used for navigating the robot to caluclate the distance travelled through math and trigonomtery.
odometer - Variable in class soccerbot.OdometryCorrection
 
odometer - Variable in class soccerbot.Screen
 
ODOMETER_PERIOD - Static variable in class soccerbot.Odometer
 
OdometryCorrection - Class in soccerbot
OdometryCorrection is a Thread that runs alongside the Odometer thread to correct its reported position using the color sensor to detect black grid lines on the field.
OdometryCorrection(Odometer, LSPoller) - Constructor for class soccerbot.OdometryCorrection
The constructor requires the Odometer thread object being used and uses the LSPoller passed to retreive color sensor data.
